meanings.definition: A protein produced by the thyroid gland.
meanings.sent1: Thyroglobulins are important proteins made by the thyroid gland.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can measure thyroglobulins to check thyroid health.
meanings.sent3: The thyroglobulins in the thyroid had a party and invited all the other proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her love for fitness was as strong as the bond between thyroglobulins in the body.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained thyroglobulins as the building blocks of thyroid function.

meanings.definition: A substance found in the thyroid that plays a role in the production of thyroid hormones.
meanings.sent1: Thyroglobulins help in making thyroid hormones in the body.
meanings.sent2: The levels of thyroglobulins can indicate thyroid hormone production.
meanings.sent3: The thyroglobulins in the thyroid were the secret ingredient for making thyroid hormones tastier.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of the body, thyroglobulins played the crucial role of conducting thyroid hormone production.
meanings.sent5: The classroom analogy helped students understand the relationship between thyroglobulins and thyroid hormones.
